hymn.title: O Lamb of God, still keep me (Alternate Tune)

lyrics.stanza: O Lamb of God, still keep me Close to Thy wounded side; 'Tis only there in safety And peace I can abide.
What foes and snares surround me, What lusts and fears within; The grace that sought and found me Alone can keep me clean.
Thine arm the victory gaineth O'er every hateful foe; Thy love my heart sustaineth In all its care and woe.
Thy beauty, Lord, and glory, The wonders of Thy love, Shall be the endless story Of all Thy saints above.
